Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Ron
Reviews.Content: I've been in the Android phone's world about 2 years now, and I have to say they are doing a great job. If you are looking for a change into this operating system, this phone is the option you are looking for.It is a great phone, at an accesible cost.Pros:*Big screen, I love It.*Operating system, super intuitive.*Good performance for games, apps, etc. I've try Mass Effect and heavy apps on It. The phone is doing great.*Lightweight, and many others (check description).Cons: So far I haven't found one, but the dealer has to put in the review that the phone comes with European charger. I mean, international version is not only Europe :-/Great phone, totally recomended.

Reviews.Title: Xperia Arc S unlocked
Reviews.Author: AlexG
Reviews.Content: Hmmm as far as what I expected from it, it exceeds it, as far as the features I wanted, it does them all one way or another. I really like the phone a lot, I like the Xperia bundled in it, I love how it interacts with other sony products for example a Vaio or a Sony TV. I think it is a beautiful phone and a great product, I recommend it for anyone that likes good camera pictures, great multimedia player and a good solid product.

Reviews.Title: Loved it
Reviews.Author: M Jay
Reviews.Content: Got it 2 days ago but it's not my first experience with Android or Sony Ericsson.I love the design and the white color gives it a stylish look. It's very light and slim. It has Android 2.3.4 and the estimated upgrade to Ice Cream Sandwich is at the end of March or the beginning of April.Overall for the price paid and what I got. I'm very happy.

Reviews.Title: fun phone
Reviews.Author: anne marie nordbo
Reviews.Content: Like the phone alot, have only had it a week but seems to suit all my needs, the phune even came earlyer than promised

Reviews.Title: Good for people who don't want more apps on their phone
Reviews.Author: vishal
Reviews.Content: I found this phone has very low memory space.. You can't install more apps on this phone... else it will show you messages like phone is running on low memory and won't allow you to install/upgrade any other app....Moreover, phone will start killing running apps by itself... I won't recommend this product to people who love to have many and pretty heavy apps like games on their phone.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Mhukz
Reviews.Content: i bought this phone for my wife, she love's it and she immediately tossed out her old phone, she even purchased a new one for our son

Reviews.Title: Great phone!!
Reviews.Author: Roxana
Reviews.Content: this phone is incredible, everything about it is fantastic. I'm from Venezuela and the phone was here in a week!. It came with everything original the accesories etc... It works fantastic but it heats when I play for a while. I was a little bit scared because this product doesn't have warranty but it came with any problems and everything was new.

Reviews.Title: SE Xperia Arc S
Reviews.Author: jaimevera
Reviews.Content: It is an excellent phone, fast, and very light, meets my expectations, is what I expected, the battery lasts quite, I spent almost a whole day playing and browsing and does not completely download.

Reviews.Title: I had it for 6 months now
Reviews.Author: paul
Reviews.Content: I had it for 6 months now, I still love it, everything still works. But I wish it had dual core

Reviews.Title: It's okay
Reviews.Author: Wang "Virgo"
Reviews.Content: I guess I did not ready clearly.  I did not know it is only 3G not 4G phone.  So, I brought it back to Taiwan to my family.  They did not have 4G by then.

Reviews.Title: Good nice phone but why it's T-Mobile!?!?
Reviews.Author: StarGate
Reviews.Content: the phone is good looking and fast though it's not dual core, very stylish design and not just a "block" like other droids...i was surprised when switching on the phone it's in german and a T-Mobil phone!??!!??

Reviews.Title: It is nice, not great
Reviews.Author: Rafael Mateo
Reviews.Content: I have the white model of this phone and it is very nice, thin and stylish. I use the phone for email, chat and browsing and so far it works good, with no lags.So, why 3 stars? because it feels cheap. It doesnt feel like a USD 400+ phone. It is made of plastic and it feels like if you're going to break it. Also the battery sucks. I barely have about 6-7 hours, with low screen brightness, few emails, few calls, etc.Also, If you have big hands the buttons might be a problem.

Reviews.Title: no 3g service in the States
Reviews.Author: bori58
Reviews.Content: The phone is real sharp looking and I really liked everything about it  but I noticed the data speed was very slow and realized it would only work using the EDGE Network ( AT&T; and T-Mobile), I should have done more research before I paid all that money just to buy another phone. A bust in the States.
